reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: 28 persons with a disability in Suan-Kuay sub-district, Kantharalak District Thailand, will generate income by selling frogs and fish that have been grown by the group. A half-day workshop will be conducted to teach the group members about management and g rowing frogs and fish. After 3 months, the frogs and fish will be sold to local restaurants as they are popular for many local Thai dishes. Income will be distributed between the group and beneficiaries of the project.
